data.text: All the storage is great!!! The only problem is that when I save gifs to it, my gifs always move slow for some reason. Also, a suggestion I have is to allow videos to loop. I hate that when I finish a video and want to replay it, it always goes to another video. I want my video to loop . So please add that feature. But everything else is great

TeraBox is an awesome app and provides secure cloud storage. It has a free version that has some good features. The best thing about it is it's really easy to use. I think anyone that needs reliable cloud storage should give it a try. It even gives you the option to automatically upload your pictures and videos to help you save time and phone storage space. Thanks TeraBox for an awesome and convenient experience. I would rate 10 stars if it was an option!

If you will not need over 1 terabyte, the app is OK. You can earn extra storage space by playing the silly games for gold to get extra space. Problem is, the extra space you earn is temporary, not permanent. App is loaded down with so many pop ups, they interfere. Features are hit and miss. Sometimes they work, sometimes they don't. Premium is worth the price, if you want to pay. Upload speed is decent, but downloading a file you have uploaded previous is hit and miss.
data.replyText:
For your question, the transfer speed is largely based on your domestic internet service condition. It is recommended to transmit under a smooth network environment.
subscribers of TeraBox Premium enjoy privileges including:
2T super large storage
Automatic video backup
High-speed download
‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
More functions are being developed

data.text: They will mislead you with thousands of ads and prompts to buy the premium options, even though you are already a premium user. They want you to think that you did not purchase the premium option for some reason, and they want you to buy their subscription repeatedly. When I contacted them about this, I discovered that I had multiple subscriptions for the same service within the same account. They confirmed the multiple subscriptions and declined my refund request. So they are 100% cheaters

data.text: Clunky interface. Something as simple as file selection shouldn't be loaded with intrusive pop ups (i am.on the paid version and still get them). Slow, clunky, cannot select a fikder to upload, have to select individual files.akes it a reap nightmare t9nuplead anything that uses the space they claim to give you. Stick with OneDrive or similar, this ain't it.

data.text: I highly recommend this app for all your storage needs has fast download and upload speeds can use it all perfectly for free you have to watch a few videos to get it for free the premium it is well worth it can be sometimes confusing to navigate the app but you'll get used to it after a while. thank you all at tera box for the great app keep up the good work.

App works great... It's the billing that's so far is shoddy and keep loosing my premium benefits. I've now signed up for premium three times. Each time with incessant auto renew. And last two times, it's just charged me the first month then didn't auto renew. No notifications nor emails nor anything. I just find out when I opened the app!

data.text: I have been using this app for almost a year now. I pay for premium monthly. I am actively trying to find a new storage option, Dropbox maybe, to store my large media library. The reason I want to drop this? ADS!! So many ads! Everything you do starts an ad. And remember, I am paying premium! For what? To have 2T of space and (supposedly) no ads. Well the 2nd is a lie. On top of that, it's like the devs are trying to mix in a Chinese made gotcha game element into the app to milk users of xtra $
data.replyText:
Dear TeraBox User, at present, only Premium subscribers can cancel advertisements. If you have already subscribed to Premium and still see an advertisement in TeraBox, please provide a screenshot that shows the location
of the advertisement. We will promptly conduct troubleshooting. Thank you for
supporting TeraBox.

data.text: Right off the bat, a whole terabyte for free is unheard of. I thought it was too good to be true, but it is not. Once you see how easy it is accessing your files on the cloud if you're not used that that, it really is very much like having a huge sd card attached to your phone/ tablet. And then its nothing to add on another TB and you could keep everything in the cloud. At least keep a backup of all your files. Makes me wonder now why all the other clouds start with only 100 gigs.

I read through the comment and I've gotten many ads about this app and truly believed it worked, but I have a few complaints...first off, it is SO slow, secondly, THE ADDS, and third of all...there isnt one actuallyüòÖ but I really hope that gets fixed cause...I waited 1 HOUR for it to load through, and it didnt, save my storage, more like waste it!
data.replyText: Dear Terabox user, we are very sorry to bring you a bad experience. We do not support the cancellation of advertisements for the time being. Terabox will continue to optimize in the future to bring you better services. Thank you for your support of Terabox!

data.text: TeraBox is an excellent app for all your storage needs. I especially like it's interactive features as alternatives to provide you with multiple options to earn more storage space and premium features. let's not forget all the interactive apps, pages and features they offer as well. TeraBox definitely gets my seal of approval. üëçüëç

Tera Box is a straightforward storage app that gets the job done. It's user-friendly and makes storing files a breeze. However, occasional glitches can be a hassle. Also, it's worth noting that the app occasionally promotes 18+ content, which may not be suitable for all users. Overall, it's a handy tool for managing your files on the go with some reservations.

Using the app is terrible due to annoying ads.you're doing "Ethicsless ad business".. If you open the app, there are three ads or more, at least if you go to the recent pages and open the app again, the same ads. "x" button is given as close. It doesn't close at all. If you click anywhere by mistake, it will go directly to Google play store. """"I wish you had an alternative app""""

data.text: I've been using the app since 2021 or so as far as I can remember. Although I often face some issues, errors and problems when uploading some files I'm glad that the developers are fixing it. It also makes me happy that the app and the developers fulfilled their promise of 1024GB of cloud storage. It sometimes annoyed me to play at least 3 or so ads to activate premium to upload some videos. Overall, the app is good though you just need to know how the app works to used it efficiently.

Holy sheeeaaat! MASSIVE IMPROVEMENTS! Uploading is almost immediate now, and deleted files are returned to the Local folder with time/date stamp removed so the user can re-save again, if needed, with new T&D stamp. One suggestion tho: when uploading, the option to switch on the ability to show only files that haven't been saved - can this be configured so it can stay ON rather than having to re-select it each time we return to save more files? The improvements are great though - many thanks!

This is the most unsecure and irritating app on playstore. Asking for unnecessary permissions and works as an advertisement factor. There are too many advertisements, and when opening the app, there will be 3 to 5 30-second ads. Then, on each click, there will be another set of 5 ads. Also, there are too many click traps. 99% of the time, Ad close buttons opens playstore for installing apps in the ads. It's a real challenge to wait and find the actual ad close button.

data.text: Terrible to use, too many buttons to ask for premium, no way to download shared videos as button to get offline or share to local leaves it in the transfer list (there is no such thing in the entire app as a transfer list) and even if you tried to watch shared videos online you cant buffer enough so it keeps stuttering. Overall maybe for storage purposes it could work but file sharing is awful. Would not recommend.

data.text: TeraBox is a tempting proposition for storage giants seeking free refuge. But be prepared to navigate a minefield of ads and sluggish performance. If convenience and speed are priorities, consider looking elsewhere. Recommendation: Worth a try if you have low expectations and a high tolerance for ads. Otherwise, look for a smoother, less intrusive cloud storage experience.

I have 3 Children, myself and the Wifey. With 10 plus years under my belt, I'm not even joking after google cloud got full, 2 500gb hard drives and computers memory too, I WAS over it needed to find reliable cloud storage for all our art and More. I COMPLETELY recommend Terabox, I've had it free for over and year now and I can no problem go back in memories and check out photos and vids no problem. Thank you Terabox team for doing what you do.

"Display files that haven't been uploaded". When I trigger this prompt everytime I transfer photos to cloud save, it doesn't really work properly as it still shows photos that I have already transferred previously. This creates the potential for duplication to arise, especially if I make mistakes like forgetting which pictures have already been saved to cloud.

Using it more than 3 years. This app is best in free cloud storage category. 1024gb free storage is not a joke. Used premium service for two years and found cheap than many big names. But the app is very glitchy and buggy. We can say it's super slow when used. They need to work hard upon it. They also need to work upon file management and search section. It's bit hard to find saved files, photos and videos sometime.

Don't install it 1. It is a Chinese app. 2. It forces you to give permission to access ALL the file on your device. This is a big red flag. 3. It forces you to register to just show preview of files sent by your users. Along with tons of ads. You see just to see preview you need to see ads. To download you need to give your ALL files access. 4. It also seems to ask other unrelated permissions like location and contacts. All in all this app is a huge red flag. Don't use it.

This app is so greedy. They want access to everything and your money. You must enable notification to "manage downloads" and give access to all files just to download one file. Ad always appears everywhere, everytime when I open a video. Can't even play a video that my teacher gave in 1080p, you must pay to play 1080p. Limited download speed if you don't pay. You can't download to your local storage. I'd never use this if my schol didn't. Don't even think to use this. OneDrive is way far better

I come back to the app for a picture I need and again HALF OF SOME THINGS I UPLOADED (even before the most recent backup) HAVE DISAPPEARED. I thought I could trust this app.

data.text: If you want a Free alternative to the "Big Tech" box-store-style Cloud storage, Check out TeraBox. I have been using it for multiple years and I have not had a single issue with the service. Thanks to TeraBox I have all the storage I need for my phone, photos and videos without losing quality.

App is Excellent. But now im not able to open the app due to frequent opening of continuous ads in time span of 2 to 5 seconds. This is repetitive and finally have to exit the app. Developers, Pls do something to avoid annoyance and facilitate us to use the app.

All features limited to Premium Membership like backing up data is compressed. Then it is useless because I can't backup the file as original. I have just updated the app to get new features but they are making it as worst as it can. If you are showing ads then atleast give us features.

data.text: STAY AWAY! I have looked everywhere in description and on website, and have come to realize content is not stored encrypted. With Ai, it's easy to exploit our content. There is no privacy when the maker has access to everything. And it being so ad-centric, one can have no doubts they're monetizing your account content with data-brokers. UPDATE : as you read in their reply, they make vague statements about "protection" (which is just your login) and don't actually say that it's encrypted!
data.replyText:
TeraBox always puts user information security first, we have built strong protection into all functions and provide multi-level data storage control to ensure your cloud data is safe and private.
We do not support canceling ads for the time being, and Terabox will continue to optimize in the future.

data.text: I have been using Terabox for quite awhile on my Samsung Galaxy A14. Have now added it to my tablet & will probably add to my Huawei Y7 as well. Great Application. Gives one more opportunities to increase GB's for more downloads & pictures. Keep up the good work. Unfortunately I don't have the resources to go Premium permanently.

The app demands "All files access", which is a sensitive and high-risk access. These high risk acess must all be prominently documented and promoted in the app's description, but it is not. The app doesn't use recommended low risk file access, so I'm surprised how it even got accepted on the Store.

I downloaded this application in hopes that I could consolidate a duplicate free home for all my pictures from all my many scattered email addresses, so I pray that this APP is everything that it's supposed to be. thank you to the creators of this application. For people to give something like this away to regular folks is what humanity is all about.

Apparently I use a ship ton of space This is a platform I agree with. Pro: extras gaming, rooms (18+) GOLD GOLD GOLD Collect by task in app, buy items which help you catch up of missed logins as well as space/storage & premium content. You can even buy books, read an Asian based novella, I dare ya. üòâ I do enjoy this app, 5 stars to the devs & all who keep it running . Con: with notifications controls, I still loathe the constant busy-ness and pings I constantly get when I'm not on app.

data.text: Hello! I've used TeraBox for a bit, but it just seems to take more of my storage space instead of decreasing it. Correct me if im dumb, but i would just like to know why. It may be the reason that all of my files havent been fully uploaded yet. I checked my storage space after downloading and uploading some files. The storage space went up. I had 3.38 gb of storage and i needed the app. The moment i installed it and a couple of minutes later it was now 3.24. So pls help if u guys can. Thank you!

data.text: Perfect app for those who are in a pinch and need an extra couple hundred gigabytes to ensure that their data gets backed up . Or for the seasoned techy who needs a few terabytes of cloud storage to keep their work/personal data safe. In my experience, TeraBox is one of the only, truly-free cloud storage apps out there. Kudos to the team behind it. ~ Jesse James Jones Beta Tester/Avid Gamer Proud TeraBox User

Get 1TB (1024 GB) of secure cloud storage, and have extra storage space for your devices. TeraBox Features: ‚òÅÔ∏è FREE cloud drive for backup your documents safely * 1024GB of free cloud storage to back up all your files. * Upload multiple types of files to TeraBox. * Multiple privacy protections. * Safely storage your files with any

Title: Frustrating User Experience I recently encountered the "I am not a robot" popup and verification process, and I must say it was incredibly irritating. The constant challenges to prove my humanity made the whole experience frustrating and time-consuming. It's essential to strike a balance between security measures and user-friendly design to ensure a smoother interaction for users.

data.text: TeraBox is Everything It's Said To Be. No Games, Gimmicks, or Catches. There's only just one thing though; "More"! . I Haven't Even Started On Premium Access.. Hope This Last Forever.
